scripts.linter:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run linter
scripts.linter:backend: pip3 install -r backend/requirements.txt && ruff check . --fix && black .
scripts.linter: npm run linter:backend && npm run linter:frontend
scripts.start:backend: pip3 install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
